name: Bhanu Pathak
position: CXO | Consumer-Tech & Marketplace Leader | xto10x | Tata Neu | Founding Team @ Udaan | Flipkart | P&G | J&J
about: I’m a Senior Operator & Builder across digital commerce, consumer-tech, and early-stage to IPO-scale businesses. Over the past 18 years, I’ve helped category-defining companies — from Flipkart and Udaan to Tata Digital and xto10x — go from zero to high-scale with strong P&L ownership and cross-functional leadership. At xto10x, I lead Academy Programs that help high-intent startups move from product-market fit to IPO readiness through structured interventions, deep operating work, and international expansion — including xto10x’s entry into Saudi/MENA. Previously, I was Chief Business Officer at Tata Digital, where I helped scale the Tata Neu super-app across grocery, health, fashion, and jewelry. As a founding team member at Udaan, I built and led the Food (Staples/FMCG) business from scratch to a $1B+ GMV run rate, and later led innovation in offline retail and quick commerce. At Flipkart, I spent ~4 years in leadership roles across category, business finance, and supply chain — helping shape the early infrastructure of Indian e-commerce. I began my career at P&G and J&J, managing large-format trade, launching national shopper marketing programs, and building out the trade marketing function for JJVC India.

posts.title: Incidental Learnings working for a start up

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: At xto10x, we partner with startups on their journey to transform initial business momentum into at-scale impact and world-class organisations.I lead the design, delivery, and growth of xto10x’s Academy Programs — structured interventions that help high-intent startups scale from PMF to IPO through deep operating work, mentorship, and masterclasses. These programs are now central to xto10x’s India and International scale strategy.Program Design & Delivery: Own the Lead various Academies for early-stage, growth stage and late stage programs, helping founders unlock growth, org clarity, and public-market readiness.Global Expansion: Driving xto10x’s entry into Saudi/MENA & Beyond, adapting India’s proven frameworks to local startup ecosystems.GTM & BD: Lead GTM across VC networks in India and MENA10x IP Creation: Co-develop frameworks and Thought Leadership Reports for practices  (People, Growth, Ops).Focus: High-intent founders solving trajectory-shifting problems, backed by deep operating support.
experience.description_html:
At xto10x, we partner with startups on their journey to transform initial business momentum into at-scale impact and world-class organisations.
I lead the design, delivery, and growth of xto10x’s Academy Programs — structured interventions that help high-intent startups scale from PMF to IPO through deep operating work, mentorship, and masterclasses. These programs are now central to xto10x’s India and International scale strategy.
Program Design & Delivery: Own the Lead various Academies for early-stage, growth stage and late stage programs, helping founders unlock growth, org clarity, and public-market readiness.
Global Expansion: Driving xto10x’s entry into Saudi/MENA & Beyond, adapting India’s proven frameworks to local startup ecosystems.
GTM & BD: Lead GTM across VC networks in India and MENA
10x IP Creation: Co-develop frameworks and Thought Leadership Reports for practices (People, Growth, Ops).

Focus: High-intent founders solving trajectory-shifting problems, backed by deep operating support.

experience.title: CBO - Tata Neu (For Grocery/Health/Fashion/Watches/Jewellery etc)
experience.description: Led strategy, P&L, and growth for Tata Neu Marketplace categories: grocery, health, fashion, watches etcDrove 10%+ share of BigBasket, 1mg, and Tata Cliq business through Tata Neu by Q3 2023.Owned sales, commercial, and product roadmap for Tata brands live on the super app; created AOP plans for new category onboarding.Launched Tata Neu’s personalization engine, AI-based shopping assistants, and chatbot commercecServed as cross-functional growth partner across product, tech, and brand teams — aligning legacy Tata brands into a unified commerce engine.
experience.description_html:
Led strategy, P&L, and growth for Tata Neu Marketplace categories: grocery, health, fashion, watches etc

Served as cross-functional growth partner across product, tech, and brand teams — aligning legacy Tata brands into a unified commerce engine.

experience.title: Founding Team & CBO - FOOD-FMCG Category
experience.description: Founding member of Udaan, India’s largest B2B e-commerce platform — led the Food business from pilot to $100M+ monthly GMV and 250K+ kirana customers/month.Owned end-to-end P&L across staples & FMCG categories; built a multi-city playbook for expansion across 30+ cities.Achieved early product-market fit in 9 months with 70% customer repeat, $110 AOV, and 40K SKUs — scaling from a 1-city pilot to national footprint.Developed onboarding and GTM strategies for both long-tail retailers and enterprise sellers/manufacturers, enabling distribution-led growth.Introduced seller monetization, warehousing, logistics, and embedded credit to improve profitability.Launched hyperlocal grocery platform ‘Pickily’, scaling to 30–40K daily orders.Built a high-performance multi-functional team; led transitions to structured BU organization and enabled leadership succession after 5+ years of scale-up.
experience.description_html:
Founding member of Udaan, India’s largest B2B e-commerce platform — led the Food business from pilot to $100M+ monthly GMV and 250K+ kirana customers/month.
Owned end-to-end P&L across staples & FMCG categories; built a multi-city playbook for expansion across 30+ cities.
Achieved early product-market fit in 9 months with 70% customer repeat, $110 AOV, and 40K SKUs — scaling from a 1-city pilot to national footprint.
Developed onboarding and GTM strategies for both long-tail retailers and enterprise sellers/manufacturers, enabling distribution-led growth.
Introduced seller monetization, warehousing, logistics, and embedded credit to improve profitability.
Launched hyperlocal grocery platform ‘Pickily’, scaling to 30–40K daily orders.
Built a high-performance multi-functional team; led transitions to structured BU organization and enabled leadership succession after 5+ years of scale-up.

positions.subtitle: Flipkart
positions.description: Built a new business line from scratch that contributed to 12% of Ekart’s total revenue, with services spanning B2B, B2C, and C2C logistics.Led a cross-functional growth pod (Product, Ops, Tech, Finance, Design) to launch and scale monetizable service offerings.Designed and launched new external logistics services in partnership with Product; scaled the unit to 10%+ of total revenue in under 12 months.Spearheaded the “servicification” of internal capabilities into client-facing logistics products, driving Flipkart's push into external revenue streams.
positions.title: Director & Head of Sales- Flipkart Suppy Chain(Ekart)
positions.description_html:
Built a new business line from scratch that contributed to 12% of Ekart’s total revenue, with services spanning B2B, B2C, and C2C logistics.
Led a cross-functional growth pod (Product, Ops, Tech, Finance, Design) to launch and scale monetizable service offerings.
Designed and launched new external logistics services in partnership with Product; scaled the unit to 10%+ of total revenue in under 12 months.
Spearheaded the “servicification” of internal capabilities into client-facing logistics products, driving Flipkart's push into external revenue streams.

publications.title: Adaptive saliency-weighted obstacle detection for the visually challenged
publications.subtitle: IEEE
publications.description: This paper focuses on distinguishing obstacles from free regions towards navigation of the visually challenged. This is an important and challenging research problem due to the unconstrained navigating environment containing diverse obstacles. It is necessary to detect if any obstacles are lying ahead in advance with high precision which will result in a warning to the person.

name: Rahul Jagannathan
position: People Practice at xto10x | Leadership roles in startups | ICF Credentialed Coach | Hogan Certified | Music Hobbyist
about: In my career straddling business as well as people roles, I have seen how organisations with the right strategy run by well-intentioned founders can get stuck because they didn't get their org set-up right. I am passionate about solving such problems. My role at xto10x focuses on working deeply with companies to align people priorities with business outcomes - taking the form of engagements varying from org design to leadership assessment & development to people systems design. Over the past few years, my interest in Applied Psychology deepened and led me to pursue training. Today, as a Professional Coach, I draw from the schools of Transactional Analysis and Psychodrama to help me work with founders, stakeholders and my teams. (Not to mention, in my personal sphere too!) Outside of work, I am known for my rather dry PJs and rather decent music skills. Having been a part of music bands since school, I became adept at playing the keys. Over the last few years, I have worked on my singing and occasionally perform for shows and record.

positions.subtitle: xto10x
positions.description: My work involves helping companies build, develop and sustain high quality leadership teams.This manifests in different kinds of interventions - ranging from leadership assessments, development interventions like coaching and learning journeys, building trust between leadership team members etc.Our programs or interventions are designed around the business goals and context of the organization, and hence we focus on going deep in areas that will create impact. I personally enjoy facilitating as a process and hence, spend my time doing some of the workshops in addition to scaling the practice.
positions.title: Head - Leadership Development Practice
positions.description_html:
My work involves helping companies build, develop and sustain high quality leadership teams.

This manifests in different kinds of interventions - ranging from leadership assessments, development interventions like coaching and learning journeys, building trust between leadership team members etc.

Our programs or interventions are designed around the business goals and context of the organization, and hence we focus on going deep in areas that will create impact.

I personally enjoy facilitating as a process and hence, spend my time doing some of the workshops in addition to scaling the practice.

positions.subtitle: xto10x
positions.description: I work with founders to set up their organizations for sustainable growth by evaluating their current org design against their strategy and figuring out what changes are needed across capabilities, structure, people and systems to best set them up for success.Quite often, this results in a need for founders to navigate change in the org with care. In such contexts, I also work with founders and leaders to help manage these transitions smoothly.We work with clients across tech and non-tech sectors which are startups and mid-sized organizations
positions.title: Organizational Design Practice
positions.description_html:
I work with founders to set up their organizations for sustainable growth by evaluating their current org design against their strategy and figuring out what changes are needed across capabilities, structure, people and systems to best set them up for success.

Quite often, this results in a need for founders to navigate change in the org with care. In such contexts, I also work with founders and leaders to help manage these transitions smoothly.

We work with clients across tech and non-tech sectors which are startups and mid-sized organizations

experience.title: Vice President - Human Resources and Culture
experience.description: Led the people mandate for a ~1000 member organization comprising a variety of talent - from tech to designers to factory workers. Managed a team of ~40 members across Talent Acquisition, HRBP, HR Operations, L&OD and Admin teams to help the business meet its objectives.Having managed this position through two waves of Covid, the experience was tough but the learning was tremendous. The journey taught me lessons in team building, crisis management, stakeholder management and leadership that I will use for the rest of my career.Over the course of time I spent at DC, I clocked over a hundred hours of interviews, hired leaders, rejigged the org design to help us scale, shaped the org culture, revamped performance management and built a highly engaged, high quality team.
experience.description_html:
Led the people mandate for a ~1000 member organization comprising a variety of talent - from tech to designers to factory workers. Managed a team of ~40 members across Talent Acquisition, HRBP, HR Operations, L&OD and Admin teams to help the business meet its objectives.

Having managed this position through two waves of Covid, the experience was tough but the learning was tremendous. The journey taught me lessons in team building, crisis management, stakeholder management and leadership that I will use for the rest of my career.

Over the course of time I spent at DC, I clocked over a hundred hours of interviews, hired leaders, rejigged the org design to help us scale, shaped the org culture, revamped performance management and built a highly engaged, high quality team.

recommendations: Shezan B. “Rahul is a wonderful human being and an asset to any organization, We hired Rahul to lead our HR division in 2019 and were pleased with what he brought to our table - he def left the HR team in a better place than when he took over. Rahul has 3 strong elements of a good leader 1) High empathy 2 ) Strong analytical skills with good first principle thinking 3) A High level of Integrity, he has also a good sense of humor but that's WIP As a senior leader in our business, we always felt we could trust Rahul and he was instrumental in helping us navigate the effects of Covid -19 within the business and to deliver the company message across a very large team. Rahul has a strong sense of ownership and the ability to drive a team towards a goal but his most impressive quality is to get everyone on the table to like and respect him.”

Amitha RKM “Rahul is an empathetic leader, who helped shape the culture at our organisation in a big way. This set in motion a multitude of cascading events that helped foster a high-performance culture across the organisation. I reported directly to Rahul for 3 years, a tenure during which I have seen Rahul encourage authenticity within the team and foster a strong sense of camaraderie, allowing the true potential of his democratic leadership style to drive change and impact. As a Manager, he trusted me to drive high impact projects, ones I was truly passionate about, with as much creative flexibility and onus as he did with others - with the bigger picture in mind. This also helped set the right operating pace for the team, one that aligned with the organisation’s fast pace of growth. His ability to strategically manoeuvre complex challenges helped us navigate the transition from an early-phase to a high-growth startup, with a fortitude that I drew tremendous inspiration from. He encouraged the cultivation of a culture of humour at the workplace, one that impacted the build of stronger relationships and definitely made work fun while we were at it. I have had a lot to learn through this opportunity of working with Rahul and I couldn’t be more confident that it will be for any individual, team or organisation that he works with in the future.”

About CareerBuilder

Over the past 20+ years, CareerBuilder has helped millions of people find jobs and has equipped hundreds of thousands of employers with the talent they need.

We combine the best in advertising, software and services to help companies find, hire and manage great talent. As an industry leader, we provide cutting-edge solutions for everything from recruiting to employment screening and human capital management.

My Role and Responsibilities

Handle sales of Software products, Recruitment Services and advertisements in the
US, Canada and India
Relentlessly prospect, identify opportunities, create the business case and close
the sale.
Post delivery of product, responsible for Account Management, Renewals and
Accounts receivables
Host monthly meetings with customers (Key Decision makers, end users) to
ensure product adoption

I have strong analytical skills, team management skills, and market research skills, which I apply to deliver impactful solutions and outcomes for my clients. I am passionate about solving complex problems, creating value, and driving growth and innovation in the startup ecosystem. I thrive in a collaborative and dynamic environment, where I can leverage my diverse perspectives and experiences to contribute to the mission and vision of xto10x.

projects.title: FaLiC - MP3 Player
projects.description: -> As a part of the academic curriculum, I worked along with 2 colleagues on creating a fast and light console- based music player, which would run without any lag on the Linux operating system. ->The goal was achieved with the code being scripted partially by shell-scripting and partially on the C language.->Made GUI using ncurses library in C.->Made features like Pause, play, stop, repeat, shuffle work using process handling in Linux. Other features like adding songs to a queue, saving playlist and playing previously saved playlists.->Achieved our best and optimum result, with 4 C programs with a minimum of 400 lines of code in a single c program.

projects.title: Farm to Fork
projects.description: A project under Enactus NSIT, Farm to Fork concentrated on the removal of middlemen between the farmers and consumers. It ensured fresh vegetables to be delivered at the doorstep and the farmer's wages increased by directly selling off his produce to the market.We presented this project in the Enactus Nationals 2013 among elite board members from leading FMSGs and corporates such as KPMG, TCS and further the project was presented in 2014 after one year of project expansion and diversification and ended up having a podium finish.

organizations.title: Collegespace

Collegespace is the socio-academic portal of N.S.I.T with over 3500+ registered members.-> Conceptualized and guided Project Chronicle, a repository which collected all the experiences of the college's alumni and their experiences.

organizations.title: Debating Society of NSIT (DebSoc)
organizations.description: The Debating Society of NSIT is a household name in Delhi and furthermore the national debating circuit. -> Volunteered in the first ever debating festival of NSIT, Colloquium in 2013 and followed it up in 2014 as the Media Relations Head, supervising the media coverage in leading newspapers such as Hindustan Times and Times of India.

name: Ankit Hetamsaria
position: xto10x | Ex-Founder Bambinos.live | Cure.fit | Flipkart
about: A self-motivated leader and founder with hands-on experience of starting a company from scratch (bambinos.live) and ability to scale start-ups across a wide range of industries such as e-commerce (Flipkart), cloud kitchen & food delivery (Eat.fit/Cure.fit) and Edtech.

experience.title: 10x Scale
experience.description: ✅ Strategic Growth & Scalability: Partnered with founders and CXOs to design and implement scalable operations frameworks, enabling 10x business growth for high-growth startups.✅ Fundraising & Financial Impact:Played a pivotal role in securing Rs. 200cr in Series A funding for a Social E-commerce startup by leading due diligence processes, ensuring end-to-end financial and operational traceability and implementing WMS & TMS systems.✅ Operational Efficiency & Cost Reduction:Led operations and network design initiatives, ensuring logistics and supply chain strategies aligned with long-term business scalability and cost optimization. Enhanced Order-to-Delivery Speed by 30% and reduced SLA breaches by 33% while optimizing operational costs by 20%.✅ Tech-Driven Operations Transformation:Spearheaded digital transformation initiatives, integrating multiple systems for real-time data visibility to streamline supply chain performance.Built data-driven decision-making frameworks, enabling businesses to improve demand forecasting accuracy and optimize overall Operations.✅ Cross-Functional Leadership & Stakeholder Engagement:Led multi-disciplinary teams spanning supply chain, finance, tech & product and data analytics, driving alignment between business goals and operational execution.
experience.description_html:
✅ Strategic Growth & Scalability:

Partnered with founders and CXOs to design and implement scalable operations frameworks, enabling 10x business growth for high-growth startups.

✅ Fundraising & Financial Impact:

Played a pivotal role in securing Rs. 200cr in Series A funding for a Social E-commerce startup by leading due diligence processes, ensuring end-to-end financial and operational traceability and implementing WMS & TMS systems.

✅ Operational Efficiency & Cost Reduction:

Led operations and network design initiatives, ensuring logistics and supply chain strategies aligned with long-term business scalability and cost optimization. Enhanced Order-to-Delivery Speed by 30% and reduced SLA breaches by 33% while optimizing operational costs by 20%.

✅ Tech-Driven Operations Transformation:

Spearheaded digital transformation initiatives, integrating multiple systems for real-time data visibility to streamline supply chain performance.

Built data-driven decision-making frameworks, enabling businesses to improve demand forecasting accuracy and optimize overall Operations.

✅ Cross-Functional Leadership & Stakeholder Engagement:

Led multi-disciplinary teams spanning supply chain, finance, tech & product and data analytics, driving alignment between business goals and operational execution.

experience.title: Co-Founder & COO
experience.description: ✅ Founded & Scaled a High-Growth EdTech Startup:Co-founded Bambinos.live, an online platform revolutionizing communication skills development for children, scaling it from zero to $1M ARRBuilt the organization from scratch, leading Operations, Technology, Finance and HR managing the entire supply function to ensure seamless execution and business growth✅ Business Growth & Revenue Expansion:Designed and implemented a scalable business model, growing the platform to serve 10,000+ students and onboarded 200+ educators across global marketsSpearheaded customer acquisition and retention strategies, increasing lifetime value (LTV) while optimizing customer acquisition cost (CAC), resulting in 100% YoY revenue growth✅ Operational Excellence & Process Automation:Established data-driven operational frameworks, reducing inefficiencies and improving service delivery by 50% through tech-driven automationLed the implementation of a centralized learning management system (LMS), enhancing educator-student interactions and driving seamless class execution✅ Fundraising & Investor Relations:Developed financial models and business strategies that positioned Bambinos.live for growth, attracting investor interest and securing seed fundingManaged P&L ownership, budgeting, and financial forecasting, ensuring sustainable cash flow management and long-term profitability✅ Cross-Functional Leadership & Culture Building:Built and led a 50-member team across product, operations, sales, and marketing, fostering a high-performance culture with a strong focus on execution and innovationDeveloped leadership succession plans, training programs, and performance metrics to drive organizational efficiency and long-term success
experience.description_html:
✅ Founded & Scaled a High-Growth EdTech Startup:

Co-founded Bambinos.live, an online platform revolutionizing communication skills development for children, scaling it from zero to $1M ARR

Built the organization from scratch, leading Operations, Technology, Finance and HR managing the entire supply function to ensure seamless execution and business growth

✅ Business Growth & Revenue Expansion:

Designed and implemented a scalable business model, growing the platform to serve 10,000+ students and onboarded 200+ educators across global markets

Spearheaded customer acquisition and retention strategies, increasing lifetime value (LTV) while optimizing customer acquisition cost (CAC), resulting in 100% YoY revenue growth

✅ Operational Excellence & Process Automation:

Established data-driven operational frameworks, reducing inefficiencies and improving service delivery by 50% through tech-driven automation

Led the implementation of a centralized learning management system (LMS), enhancing educator-student interactions and driving seamless class execution

✅ Fundraising & Investor Relations:

Developed financial models and business strategies that positioned Bambinos.live for growth, attracting investor interest and securing seed funding

Managed P&L ownership, budgeting, and financial forecasting, ensuring sustainable cash flow management and long-term profitability

✅ Cross-Functional Leadership & Culture Building:

Built and led a 50-member team across product, operations, sales, and marketing, fostering a high-performance culture with a strong focus on execution and innovation

Developed leadership succession plans, training programs, and performance metrics to drive organizational efficiency and long-term success

experience.title: Eat.Fit
experience.description: ✅ Scaled India’s Second Largest Cloud Kitchen Network:Led kitchen operations and supply chain, scaling Eat.fit from a single cloud kitchen in Bangalore to 75+ kitchens across 15 cities in IndiaDesigned and implemented operational playbooks, automation tools and real-time dashboards, improving efficiency and standardizing processes across all locations✅ Operational Cost Optimization & Profitability:Built and led the Operations Design & Excellence team, achieving a 40% cost reduction in kitchen operations through process streamlining, workflow optimization and wastage reduction strategiesPartnered with finance and procurement teams to negotiate strategic supplier contracts, lowering raw material costs while maintaining quality standards✅ Logistics & Delivery Optimization:Worked closely with the last-mile logistics team, redesigning order batching, delivery routes and fulfillment models, reducing delivery costs by 30% while maintaining SLAsLaunched centralized kitchens in major metros, optimizing food preparation and distribution, resulting in a 20% reduction in food wastage and enhanced product consistency✅ Tech-Enabled Operations & Automation:Spearheaded the deployment of kitchen automation and IoT-based monitoring, ensuring compliance with safety, hygiene, and quality standards across locations✅ Cross-Functional Leadership & High-Performance Team Building:Led a 500+ member operations team, including kitchen managers, logistics coordinators, and quality control specialists, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and operational excellencePartnered with technology, finance, and quality teams to enhance customer experience and improve demand-supply balance
experience.description_html:
✅ Scaled India’s Second Largest Cloud Kitchen Network:

Led kitchen operations and supply chain, scaling Eat.fit from a single cloud kitchen in Bangalore to 75+ kitchens across 15 cities in India

Designed and implemented operational playbooks, automation tools and real-time dashboards, improving efficiency and standardizing processes across all locations

✅ Operational Cost Optimization & Profitability:

Built and led the Operations Design & Excellence team, achieving a 40% cost reduction in kitchen operations through process streamlining, workflow optimization and wastage reduction strategies

Partnered with finance and procurement teams to negotiate strategic supplier contracts, lowering raw material costs while maintaining quality standards

✅ Logistics & Delivery Optimization:

Worked closely with the last-mile logistics team, redesigning order batching, delivery routes and fulfillment models, reducing delivery costs by 30% while maintaining SLAs

Launched centralized kitchens in major metros, optimizing food preparation and distribution, resulting in a 20% reduction in food wastage and enhanced product consistency

✅ Tech-Enabled Operations & Automation:

Spearheaded the deployment of kitchen automation and IoT-based monitoring, ensuring compliance with safety, hygiene, and quality standards across locations

✅ Cross-Functional Leadership & High-Performance Team Building:

Led a 500+ member operations team, including kitchen managers, logistics coordinators, and quality control specialists, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and operational excellence

Partnered with technology, finance, and quality teams to enhance customer experience and improve demand-supply balance

experience.title: Associate Director
experience.description: ✅ Scaled Operations 40x to Handle 1M+ Daily Shipments:Led Last Mile Delivery (LMD) & First Mile Pickup (FMP) operations, driving Flipkart’s supply chain expansion and scalability during its hypergrowth phaseScaled operations from 25,000 shipments per day to over 1 million daily shipments ensuring >99% delivery reliability and an industry-leading customer experience✅ Strategic Cost Reduction & Operational Efficiency:Spearheaded cost optimization initiatives, achieving a 35% reduction in logistics costs while maintaining delivery speed and service levelsImplemented route optimization, improved shipment sortation through tech and last-mile delivery enhancements, improving on-time delivery performance by 20%✅ Control Tower Implementation for Real-Time Visibility:Built and managed Control Tower, providing real-time monitoring and predictive analytics for shipment tracking and exception handlingReduced delivery failures and escalations by 30% through data-driven decision-making and proactive issue monitoring and resolution✅ Leadership & Cross-Functional Collaboration:Led a large-scale operations team including operations analysts, regional and area managers fostering a culture of high performance and operational excellencePartnered with cross-functional teams including Planning, Finance, Tech, HRBP and Quality to drive strategic cost optimization and operational efficiency
experience.description_html:
✅ Scaled Operations 40x to Handle 1M+ Daily Shipments:

Led Last Mile Delivery (LMD) & First Mile Pickup (FMP) operations, driving Flipkart’s supply chain expansion and scalability during its hypergrowth phase

Scaled operations from 25,000 shipments per day to over 1 million daily shipments ensuring >99% delivery reliability and an industry-leading customer experience

✅ Strategic Cost Reduction & Operational Efficiency:

Spearheaded cost optimization initiatives, achieving a 35% reduction in logistics costs while maintaining delivery speed and service levels

Implemented route optimization, improved shipment sortation through tech and last-mile delivery enhancements, improving on-time delivery performance by 20%

✅ Control Tower Implementation for Real-Time Visibility:

Built and managed Control Tower, providing real-time monitoring and predictive analytics for shipment tracking and exception handling

Reduced delivery failures and escalations by 30% through data-driven decision-making and proactive issue monitoring and resolution

✅ Leadership & Cross-Functional Collaboration:

Led a large-scale operations team including operations analysts, regional and area managers fostering a culture of high performance and operational excellence

Partnered with cross-functional teams including Planning, Finance, Tech, HRBP and Quality to drive strategic cost optimization and operational efficiency

positions.description_html:
Founder's Academy
- What: Founder-focused masterclasses on 10 scaling pillars (xto10x framework)
- Impact: 100+ founders graduated; 1 in 3 became unicorns, portfolio growth of ~10-12x. Notable alumni include Razorpay, Groww, Licious, Wakefit, Rapido and more
- My Role: Collaborated with startup operators (scaling 500+ startups) to develop playbooks and case studies

Leadership Quotient
- What: 360° feedback tool to improve leaders's effectiveness
- Impact: The tools has helped 700+ leaders in India, SEA and MENA get a comprehensive overview of their strengths and improvement areas
- My role: Coded the software that instantly generates personalized reports using survey data

IIMB Partnership
- Partnered with IIMB Bangalore to co-create a course for students. Featured speakers from Flipkart, Licious, PhonePe, and Curefoods
- Impact: 4.79/5 session rating. NPS of 60+
- My role: Program managed the initiative and later transformed it into a standalone learning product

B2C Products
-Designed a full-cycle process from planning to post-production (converting office space into studio, onboarded 3PL editors, etc). Produced videos at cost of ~20k per hour of video,industry benchmark is ~1L per hour
- Repurposed IIMB recordings into a B2C product. Achieved 500+ course signups and a 4.79/5 rating
- Launched "The Startup Insiders" brand, grew the followership to 1000+
- Produced marketing videos to drive enrollment in our products (Sample: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ppdSX5dkOho)

projects.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
projects.description: Self-Organizing Maps, DBSCAN------------------------✔Programmed a Self-Organizing Map (build on the idea of k-nearest neighbours) to filter potential credit card frauds using outlier detectionImplemented the DBSCAN (Density-based spatial clustering of applications with noise) on the same dataset for outlier detection

projects.title: Power Prediction in a Combined Cycle Power Plant
projects.description: ●Primary Objective:- Predicting the electric power in a CCPP using a model that can generate better accuracy compared to other traditional models results without being computationally expensive.●Solution: - Built an Extreme Learning Machine model (a novel fast learning algorithm) that was able to generate better results compared to traditional ML algorithms and MLPs. The model had an overall R2 of 0.925 and an RMSE of 4.121●Mentor:- Dr. Rajesh Kumar Tripathy, Assistant Professor, EEE Department, Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS) Pilani

projects.title: Statistical Analysis on Suicide Demographic in Telangana
projects.description: ●Primary Objective: - Examine the suicide rates among males and females in Telangana from 2014 to 2016 ●Solution:- We were able to make conclusions on various socio-economic parameters that led to the suicide rates in both men and women. We also concluded how the data could be improved to increase the reliability of our statistical models. ●Mentor:- Dr. V. V. Haragopal, Guest faculty, Department of Mathematics, Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS) Pilani

projects.title: Genre Prediction using Song Lyrics
projects.description: ●An Artificial Neural Networks was used to classify the songs solely based on their lyrics into Hip-Hop, Metal and Country with a classification accuracy of 86.8%●Another ANN was run to classify the songs into one of twelve categories with a classification accuracy of 55.6%

projects.title: Recommendation System
projects.description: Autoencoders and RBMIn order to suggest movies to a user based on the ratings of other movies and with the confidence that he/she would like it, a movie recommendation engine was designed using two different neural network models.Implementation using Autoencoders was done to predict the rating the user would give (out of 5) to different movies (0.96 RMSE and 78% classification accuracy)Implementation using Restricted Boltzmann Machine was done to predict whether a user would like a movie or not with 80% classification accuracy

projects.title: Material characterization of phenolic resins
projects.description: The objective of the project was to evaluate the better performing resin obtained from two different manufacturers using Rheological, Thermal and Spectroscopic Techniques.The results were interpreted to understand the effect of catalyst and cross-linking on the properties.

about: I'm a senior Mechanical Engineering undergraduate at BITS Pilani, deeply passionate about Supply Chain Management and Mechanical Design Engineering. Currently, I'm working at Flipkart, as a supply planning intern . As the CTO of the Inspired Karters Gravity team, I've honed my leadership and engineering skills while designing a human-powered rover for NASA's HERC event. Committed to personal growth and teamwork, I'm poised to excel in roles spanning Supply Chain, Mechanical Design, Product Management, or Business Analysis. As graduation approaches, I'm eager to transition into a full-time role, leveraging my unique skill set and dedication to drive success in these fields

about: Dedicated psychologist with a strong focus on leveraging insights to drive impactful market research, consumer insights, and UX research initiatives. As a skilled researcher, I have conducted extensive studies to uncover consumer triggers, barriers, and product-market fit. My expertise lies in utilizing both quantitative and qualitative methodologies to deliver actionable recommendations. With a deep understanding of human behavior, I excel in analyzing data and providing valuable insights that drive effective marketing strategies and enhance consumer experiences. My background in private practice as a Psychotherapist has honed my ability to empathize and understand complex emotional needs. I believe that I’m a person with immense Creativity and Curiosity which makes me think out of the box during Problem Solving. I am passionate about Personal Growth, Mental health and Sustainability.

projects.title: Master’s Dissertation: “Exploring the Association between Psychological Flexibility, Student Stress & Anxiety among Indian University Students during COVID-19 Crisis”
projects.description: Found using regression analysis, that the Psychological Flexibility negatively predicted (β = -.049, t = -5.76, p < 0.001) anxiety among Indian University Students. Thus, highlighting the importance of Psychological Flexibility as a promising resource in reducing anxiety among Indian University Students during the pandemic, using Acceptance Commitment Therapy• Completed the research under supervision of Dr. Ishita Bharadwaj• Was in top 25% of the class to be awarded the opportunity to do dissertation project with the University of Delhi, North Campus• The Paper has been reviewed & accepted, and is in process of being published.

projects.title: “A Systems approach to addressing Substance Abuse in India: A Community based Psychoeducation Model for Pregnant Women”
projects.description: Designed a systems model of tobacco cessation for pregnant women from socially disadvantaged background. The model included individual counselling for psychoeducation, relapse prevention and community wide initiatives for policy changes and community health literacy

about: I am passionate about bringing out Value, solving complex problems & building capabilities. Accelerating in Start-up environment with strengths in Strategy, Growth, PMF, CX, Product, Analytics, Ops Design & Excellence. I also come with experience in Manufacturing Operations, Process Engineering, People Management and Quality Assurance at P&G, India. Have been lucky to have driven some amazing transformations (0->1 and x->10x) with few exciting startups. I enjoy Dance, Fitness, Fine Arts, Sciences (esp. Theoretical Physics), Photography and Anime! Grow yourself and people || Fail small and Fail early

recommendations: Abhishek B V “As someone who's worked with him very closely, Arya comes across as a keen learner, great problem solver and has the go-getter attitude. He's able to structure his thoughts really well and lay down a solid fundamental framework to build from. Arya's also detail oriented and ensures that the right level of zoom-in is done. Alongside being excellent at work, he has a passion for interests like rock climbing & sketching that make him so well rounded. You can always bet on Arya to give his best to the cause & step back. Operates with a maturity and thought process that's years ahead of his age and is poised for great heights. Enjoyed working with him on some tough, exciting problem statements at Bounce. Wishing him the very best!”

recommendations: Rajat Aggarwal “I had the privilege of working closely with Abhishek at Lithium, where he served as my manager in his role as Assistant Finance Controller. name: Rishhi Mehra
position: Connecting Talent with Opportunity
about: With over 20 years of industry experience, Rishi is a founder and leader of RIVR Partners, a talent and human capital advisory firm that specializes in the internet/tech ecosystem. Rishi and his team offer a range of services, from executive search and employer branding to recruitment process optimization and HR advisory and training, for organizations at various stages of funding and growth. Rishi is also a strategic advisor to various early stage product companies advising on variety of aspects like - fund raise, HR Frameworks, Early Hiring Strategy etc. Rishi's core competencies include leadership hiring, talent management, behavioral interviewing, talent development, team management, stakeholder management, and client relations. Rishi is passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and creating value for both candidates and clients.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Select project experience:Post-Merger Integration support for a global FMCG giant acquiring the consumer health business of a pharmaceutical company• Smooth migration of 2000+ employees, across 10 geographies, by deploying high-touch support model• Identified day 1 risks related to data and helped resolve the risks through effective mitigation mechanismDigital transformation of material forecasting to assure gross margin projections for a global FMCG business leader • Engaged with 100+ buyers to analyse the highly varied material forecasting process across 30+ countries, involving completely different portfolios & forecasting methodologies to identify standardization opportunities • Digitization of the extensive manual process using automation tools such as Anaplan, ML/Data science models with Data Lake as back bone• Fundamental impact through approx. 20% improvement in forecasting accuracy, 70% reduction in effort and 50% reduction in cycle time through automation of the entire packaging portfolio with an approx. value > €9 billionStrategy design & detailed business model evaluation to outsource township management services for a large PSU steel manufacturer• Assessed the as-is condition of infrastructure and identified potential improvement areas by conducting an exhaustive study of processes and systems in place across the 5 townships locations• Comprehensive analysis (equity participation, shareholding, revenue streams, PSU’s role) of the two identified business models i.e. Total Facility Management and Joint Venture, along with financial projections • Single-handedly developed the power distribution outsourcing; projected savings of ~INR 900 Cr across a 15 year period through a detailed financial modelCross-industry business development experience via building proposals & capability notes and conducting dipstick studies
experience.description_html:
Select project experience:

Post-Merger Integration support for a global FMCG giant acquiring the consumer health business of a pharmaceutical company
• Smooth migration of 2000+ employees, across 10 geographies, by deploying high-touch support model
• Identified day 1 risks related to data and helped resolve the risks through effective mitigation mechanism

Digital transformation of material forecasting to assure gross margin projections for a global FMCG business leader
• Engaged with 100+ buyers to analyse the highly varied material forecasting process across 30+ countries, involving completely different portfolios & forecasting methodologies to identify standardization opportunities
• Digitization of the extensive manual process using automation tools such as Anaplan, ML/Data science models with Data Lake as back bone
• Fundamental impact through approx. 20% improvement in forecasting accuracy, 70% reduction in effort and 50% reduction in cycle time through automation of the entire packaging portfolio with an approx. value > €9 billion

Strategy design & detailed business model evaluation to outsource township management services for a large PSU steel manufacturer
• Assessed the as-is condition of infrastructure and identified potential improvement areas by conducting an exhaustive study of processes and systems in place across the 5 townships locations
• Comprehensive analysis (equity participation, shareholding, revenue streams, PSU’s role) of the two identified business models i.e. Total Facility Management and Joint Venture, along with financial projections
• Single-handedly developed the power distribution outsourcing; projected savings of ~INR 900 Cr across a 15 year period through a detailed financial model

Cross-industry business development experience via building proposals & capability notes and conducting dipstick studies

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Project TitleRefurbishment & Relisting process design to improve realization on Unsellable Inventory (Customer returned products) in Audio category Key HighlightsAscertained the net impact of the unsellable inventory on Audio category & Cloudtail P&L statementEstablished the process work flow to grade & relist products on Amazon.in under the refurbished categoryFormulated a detailed gradation framework to bucketize the unsellable inventory into Grade A, B & C unitsConducted a pilot with an audio brand resulting in 20%+ improvement over current unsellable realization ratesCaptured learnings from the pilot & proposed a scalable model for covering more categories under the model
experience.description_html:
Project Title
Refurbishment & Relisting process design to improve realization on Unsellable Inventory (Customer returned products) in Audio category

Key Highlights
Ascertained the net impact of the unsellable inventory on Audio category & Cloudtail P&L statement
Established the process work flow to grade & relist products on Amazon.in under the refurbished category
Formulated a detailed gradation framework to bucketize the unsellable inventory into Grade A, B & C units
Conducted a pilot with an audio brand resulting in 20%+ improvement over current unsellable realization rates
Captured learnings from the pilot & proposed a scalable model for covering more categories under the model

experience.title: Product Designer
experience.description: UX Design Intern – Magnifi (AI Investment Assistant) - Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance the overall user experience across the website and mobile application, delivering a more intuitive and engaging interface.  - Conducted comprehensive UX and UI audits to identify pain points and streamline functionality, ensuring a seamless and efficient user journey.  - Designed and proposed new features aimed at expanding the product's capabilities, several of which are under consideration for future implementation.  - Led the redesign of the cart and trade confirmation flows on both mobile and web platforms, leveraging research insights to optimize user satisfaction and efficiency.  This experience allowed me to blend user research, design strategy, and iterative improvements to elevate the product’s overall usability and impact.
experience.description_html:
UX Design Intern – Magnifi (AI Investment Assistant)

- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance the overall user experience across the website and mobile application, delivering a more intuitive and engaging interface.

- Conducted comprehensive UX and UI audits to identify pain points and streamline functionality, ensuring a seamless and efficient user journey.

- Designed and proposed new features aimed at expanding the product's capabilities, several of which are under consideration for future implementation.

- Led the redesign of the cart and trade confirmation flows on both mobile and web platforms, leveraging research insights to optimize user satisfaction and efficiency.

This experience allowed me to blend user research, design strategy, and iterative improvements to elevate the product’s overall usability and impact.

recommendations: Vijay Babu T S “Sriram joined our team as a design intern and created good impact in a short span of time. He worked on key product features, website revamp, and event designs, all of which were executed with creativity and precision. His dedication to delivering good-quality work and his ability to handle feedback and iterate was impressive. Sriram is also fun to work with, and a great team player who collaborated seamlessly with cross-functional teams. His positive energy brought a great vibe to the team, and his contributions will definitely have a lasting impact. I’m excited to see all the amazing work he will do in the future!”

about: I thrive on building and scaling businesses. Over the past decade, I’ve worked across strategy, growth, and transformation, helping startups and enterprises unlock new opportunities. At xto10x (founded by Binny Bansal, Neeraj Aggarwal & Saikiran Krishnamurthy), I scaled revenue to 10x in four years, partnering with 500+ startups, including Homelane, Groww, Razorpay, Medibuddy, Amagi, Meesho etc. I spearheaded xto10x’s expansion into Saudi Arabia, conceptualized the xto10x IPO Academy to guide startups toward public listings, and built strategic partnerships with top VCs like Elevation, Accel, Prosus, Endeavour to drive xto10x's growth charter. Additionally, I worked closely with the founders on high-impact initiatives to shape company strategy. At McKinsey, I led strategy projects across growth, org design, and cost optimization. I redesigned GTM architecture, distribution strategy, and developed long-term business growth plans for industry leaders in automotive, manufacturing, and infrastructure spaces. An SRCC Gold Medalist and IIM Bangalore alum, I’m passionate about solving complex problems, driving growth, and scaling businesses efficiently.

current_company.name: Microsoft
current_company.title: Lead - VC and PE Partnerships | Microsoft for Startups (AI)

experience.title: Lead - VC and PE Partnerships | Microsoft for Startups (AI)
experience.description: I lead Microsoft’s efforts to engage with venture capital and private equity firms in India — with the goal of helping their portfolio companies scale faster using Microsoft’s technology and global reach.My focus areas:- Building meaningful partnerships with funds across early and growth stages.- Helping portfolio startups get access to Azure, GitHub, Copilot, Microsoft for Startups, and our GTM programs.- Creating joint opportunities - from curated showcases to thought leadership sessions - that connect innovation with enterprise scale.It’s a unique role at the intersection of capital, cloud, and collaboration - and I’m excited to shape what comes next.
experience.description_html:
I lead Microsoft’s efforts to engage with venture capital and private equity firms in India — with the goal of helping their portfolio companies scale faster using Microsoft’s technology and global reach.

My focus areas:
- Building meaningful partnerships with funds across early and growth stages.
- Helping portfolio startups get access to Azure, GitHub, Copilot, Microsoft for Startups, and our GTM programs.
- Creating joint opportunities - from curated showcases to thought leadership sessions - that connect innovation with enterprise scale.

It’s a unique role at the intersection of capital, cloud, and collaboration - and I’m excited to shape what comes next.

experience.title: Head of GTM
experience.description: Led xto10x’s revenue growth from inception, scaling its revenue 10x in four years, acquiring 500+ top startups and establishing xto10x as the go-to partner for scaling, profitability, and IPO readiness.Key Achievements:1. Revenue Leadership & GTM Strategy: Built and executed GTM strategies, performance marketing, and ecosystem partnerships, driving multi-channel revenue growth and scaling xto10x’s client base to 500+ startups (including Meesho, Razorpay, Amagi, Proptiger, Purplle etc.)2. VC & PE Partnerships: Developed xto10x’s investor engagement model, forging partnerships with VCs and PEs like Peak XV, Elevation, Accel, Fireside, Endeavour, Beenext.3. Thought Leadership & IPO Advisory: Led the launch of xto10x IPO Academy, bringing together 30+ market leaders, public market investors, founders, i-bankers and regulators to guide startups on public market readiness.4. Global Expansion & Market Entry: Spearheaded xto10x’s Saudi Arabia expansion, working with the KSA Crown Prince’s Office, driving double digit revenue for xto10x and unlocking new market opportunities.5. Brand & Ecosystem Influence: Organised high-impact industry initiatives, including the xto10x Startup Summit, and CXO roundtables & events, engaging 1,000+ founders and 250+ CHROs.
experience.description_html:
Led xto10x’s revenue growth from inception, scaling its revenue 10x in four years, acquiring 500+ top startups and establishing xto10x as the go-to partner for scaling, profitability, and IPO readiness.

Key Achievements:
1. Revenue Leadership & GTM Strategy: Built and executed GTM strategies, performance marketing, and ecosystem partnerships, driving multi-channel revenue growth and scaling xto10x’s client base to 500+ startups (including Meesho, Razorpay, Amagi, Proptiger, Purplle etc.)

2. VC & PE Partnerships: Developed xto10x’s investor engagement model, forging partnerships with VCs and PEs like Peak XV, Elevation, Accel, Fireside, Endeavour, Beenext.

3. Thought Leadership & IPO Advisory: Led the launch of xto10x IPO Academy, bringing together 30+ market leaders, public market investors, founders, i-bankers and regulators to guide startups on public market readiness.

4. Global Expansion & Market Entry: Spearheaded xto10x’s Saudi Arabia expansion, working with the KSA Crown Prince’s Office, driving double digit revenue for xto10x and unlocking new market opportunities.

5. Brand & Ecosystem Influence: Organised high-impact industry initiatives, including the xto10x Startup Summit, and CXO roundtables & events, engaging 1,000+ founders and 250+ CHROs.

positions.subtitle: McKinsey & Company
positions.description: Extensive large-scale transformation experience across functions; i.e. Marketing & Sales (channel growth strategy, B2B, brand led growth), Organization design (change management, operating model, capability building at-scale) and Operations (manufacturing, procurement)1. Growth & GTM Strategy: Led market expansion, sales acceleration, and channel strategy initiatives, driving significant topline growth across automotive, manufacturing, and infrastructure sectors.2. Organizational Design & Operating Model: Restructured leadership models, governance frameworks, and capability-building programs, enhancing execution and scale for retail, aviation, and industrial clients.3. Operations & Cost Optimization: Delivered large-scale efficiency improvements in procurement, supply chain, and manufacturing for pharma, metals & mining, and energy companies.4. Long-Term Strategy & Market Insights: Designed strategic roadmaps, investment strategies, and industry reports, shaping business growth and sector transformation in oil & gas, power, and infrastructure investments.

1. Growth & GTM Strategy: Led market expansion, sales acceleration, and channel strategy initiatives, driving significant topline growth across automotive, manufacturing, and infrastructure sectors.

2. Organizational Design & Operating Model: Restructured leadership models, governance frameworks, and capability-building programs, enhancing execution and scale for retail, aviation, and industrial clients.

3. Operations & Cost Optimization: Delivered large-scale efficiency improvements in procurement, supply chain, and manufacturing for pharma, metals & mining, and energy companies.

4. Long-Term Strategy & Market Insights: Designed strategic roadmaps, investment strategies, and industry reports, shaping business growth and sector transformation in oil & gas, power, and infrastructure investments.

recommendations: Deepak Pruthy “Sonali is the most hardworking person I have known till date, along with Modi ji of course! An astute planner who not only plans for herself but for her team and client as well. She sets very high standard of performance for her as well as the team. If client expected X, McKinsey leadership expected 1.2X; her benchmark was always 2X. I have always seen clients admiring her work ethic even in her absence. She always takes a holistic approach to building growth. The agility with which she used to switch from B2B2C to B2B to a branding workstream was praiseworthy. On a humane side, she is one of the finest individual I have come across. Sonali is a leader par excellence!”

name: Chaitanya Avatapalli
position: Rebuilding the world's trust in its food | Founder's Office at The Whole Truth
about: Chaitanya is a seasoned professional with a deep experience of working with startups and high growth companies. He is currently a management consultant at xto10x, where he advises early-stage and growth-stage companies on a range of strategic and operational issues. With expertise in entrepreneurship, strategy & operations, and people & culture transformation, Chaitanya brings a unique perspective to his work. He has worked with clients across multiple industries, including B2B SaaS, e-commerce, EdTech, FinTech and HealthTech. Prior to joining xto10x, Chaitanya has had a diverse career with stints in consulting, B2B SaaS Sales, and entrepreneurial ventures. He has successfully led product launches, business expansions, and process improvements, consistently delivering measurable results. Chaitanya holds a Master's degree in Organization Development, Change & Leadership from Tata Institute of Social Sciences and is a PhD scholar at Jamnalal Bajaj Institute of Management Studies.

name: Mahathi Gopalakrishnan
position: Prev. McKinsey, xto10x
about: Hello! If you're here, you've found the internet manifestation of my quest to find work that feels like play. Welcome :) I'm driven by a curiosity surrounding what I can do to make people's personal and professional lives easier or more meaningful. My path (from consulting to edtech to founder development to entrepreneurship) has been shaped by this curiosity. Each step has taught me something valuable: how big companies transform even at their scales, how beautiful products grow, how founders learn and lead, and how to validate ideas directly with users. When I'm not working, you'll find me experimenting in the kitchen, training my voice to sing well all the songs I sing badly anyway, or reading!

experience.title: Building 10xAcademy
experience.description: Wore multiple hats to help founders navigate the messy middle of scaling up1. As part of the Leadership Learning team and the Growth Consulting team:- Led xto10x's flagship 3-month learning program for founders of B2C/ D2C growth-stage startups in partnership with Peak XV Partners (formerly Sequoia India & SEA) - pivoted the offering to focus on sustainable growth with deeper 1:1 mentorship and brought 7 startups (including Minimalist, Qoala, Eduvanz) through the program- Developed growth roadmaps for consumer startups looking to uncover new growth levers, by leveraging user research and app usage data. For e.g., helped India's first e-bike producer unlock a previously untapped market2. As a Product and Marketing Lead: - Created 'Leadership Quotient' from scratch - a first-of-its-kind tool that helps founders and startup leaders understand and elevate their leadership style. This was the first time I worked with developers and designers to bring a product to life, and I absolutely loved this experience!- Built founder-centric communities - launched 'The Startup Summit' (bringing 100+ new startups into xto10x's top-of-funnel) and 'The Startup Founders' Community' (creating trusted circles for 25+ growth-stage founders)
experience.description_html:
Wore multiple hats to help founders navigate the messy middle of scaling up

1. As part of the Leadership Learning team and the Growth Consulting team:
- Led xto10x's flagship 3-month learning program for founders of B2C/ D2C growth-stage startups in partnership with Peak XV Partners (formerly Sequoia India & SEA) - pivoted the offering to focus on sustainable growth with deeper 1:1 mentorship and brought 7 startups (including Minimalist, Qoala, Eduvanz) through the program
- Developed growth roadmaps for consumer startups looking to uncover new growth levers, by leveraging user research and app usage data. For e.g., helped India's first e-bike producer unlock a previously untapped market

2. As a Product and Marketing Lead:
- Created 'Leadership Quotient' from scratch - a first-of-its-kind tool that helps founders and startup leaders understand and elevate their leadership style. This was the first time I worked with developers and designers to bring a product to life, and I absolutely loved this experience!
- Built founder-centric communities - launched 'The Startup Summit' (bringing 100+ new startups into xto10x's top-of-funnel) and 'The Startup Founders' Community' (creating trusted circles for 25+ growth-stage founders)

experience.title: Growth & Strategy
experience.description: Helped the team test and prove growth levers- Planned GTM strategy for a new vertical (Toddle for IBDP) and collaborated with COO and sales teams to identify the right staffing requirements to launch and scale the product's revenues significantly- Worked with the CEO to design and launch new GTM channels including affiliate programs in regions where we had low penetration (like LatAm) - drove meaningful revenue growth within just 3 months of starting the initiatives
experience.description_html:
Helped the team test and prove growth levers

- Planned GTM strategy for a new vertical (Toddle for IBDP) and collaborated with COO and sales teams to identify the right staffing requirements to launch and scale the product's revenues significantly
- Worked with the CEO to design and launch new GTM channels including affiliate programs in regions where we had low penetration (like LatAm) - drove meaningful revenue growth within just 3 months of starting the initiatives

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Worked on projects spanning retail, banking, education, and private equity- Designed a first-of-its-kind retail cost transformation program for a large Indian grocery retailer - independently led store cost transformation efforts and instituted an innovative part-time staffing model across their extensive store network of roughly 700 stores- Partnered with McKinsey's specialist change facilitation team (Aberkyn) to design and deliver a leadership development & cultural transformation program during the merger of three large public sector banks - created development plans for leaders to gain role clarity and build trust- Led strategic initiatives for an education non-profit, including implementing blended learning approaches and developing an expansion plan to diversify impact beyond Tier 1 cities
experience.description_html:

experience.title: Talent Partner
experience.description: Supported 2 RPO Projects Ciena is a networking systems, services, and software company. We help our clients build more adaptive networks in response to the constantly changing demands of their users—businesses and consumers alike. We do this by delivering best-in-class networking technology through high-touch consultative relationships, backed by 26 years of experience in building the world’s most complex networks.Qlik’s vision is a data-literate world, where everyone can use data and analytics to improve decision-making and solve their most challenging problems. Qlik provides an end-to-end, real-time data integration and analytics cloud platform to close the gaps between data, insights and action. By transforming data into Active Intelligence, businesses can drive better decisions, improve revenue and profitability, and optimize customer relationships. Qlik does business in more than 100 countries and serves over 50,000 customers around the world.

Evaluate the best rates among the Vendors,and
Act as an Alliance between the Suppliers and the Client.
Relationship Management with key Stakeholders.
Project management over key client / supplier projects
Manages relations with suppliers to assure delivery of service, along-side acquisition and assignment specialists
Supplier evaluation and evaluating their performance on specific parameters annually and suggest measures on better performance.
Lead the team on efficient delivery for Recruitment process.
Customer Interaction, Relationship Management and negotiation for all Operational Activities
Assure Program Processes and Procedures Adherence
Develop and Implement Solutions to Delivery Issues
Coordinating Leadership and Customer Involvement for Problem Resolution and/or Critical Decision Making.
Contribute content to Monthly Operational Reviews (MORs) and Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs) with client stakeholders

recommendations: Sai Gopal “Had the pleasure of working with Dipika at both her previous stints with Purple Quarter and Native. I rate her as one of the finest talents in executive search. Her eye for detail while deep diving into the requirements of clients was something that always impressed me in particular. Building a rapport with clients and candidates alike was another impressive trait. Goal oriented and hand on, she was an ever dependent colleague to work with. Wishing her all the very best.”

Jitender Sharan “I took help from Dipika to close a critical role in my org recently. She diligently created a profile of the responsibilities from our briefs and created proposals on candidate fitment. She also kept up with our own vision changes in this process. I believe her candidate liaison was exceptional and allowed a very high quality first touch. Her ability to drive coveted candidates in a tough economic scenario was unmatched. We appreciated that she worked hard to master our pitch and deliver it with clarity. The discussions, interviews and the closure were all smooth and predictable. I highly recommend her and would definitely work with her again.”
